85299.「１枚のカードのすべての枠に\n スタンプが押された時 その枚数ごとに\n 豪華:
When all the spaces on a card are stamped, I'll let you take a prize for each one!
. I look forward to hearing of your journey.

88168.「うむ。よくやった <pc>。 \n 今後も この調子で クエストを\n バリバ:
Mm. Well done . I hope you will continue to do quests like this in the future.
When all the spaces on a card are stamped, I'll let you take a prize for each one!
. I look forward to hearing of your journey.
